list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a brightly colored rubber sac inflated with air and then sealed at the neck, used as a children's toy or a decoration.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the room was festooned with balloons and streamers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Căn phòng được lễ hội với bóng bay và Streamers

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large bag filled with hot air or gas to make it rise in the air, typically carrying a basket for passengers.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he set his sights on crossing the Pacific by balloon
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đặt tầm nhìn của mình về việc vượt qua Thái Bình Dương bằng khinh khí cầu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a rounded outline in which the words or thoughts of characters in a comic strip or cartoon are written.
a large rounded drinking glass, used for brandy and other drinks.
swell out in a spherical shape; billow.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the trousers ballooned out below his waist
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: quần bóng bay ra bên dưới eo của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he is famous for ballooning across oceans
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy nổi tiếng với bóng bay trên đại dương
